PageWidgetPortable.Title: Abertos
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_FT_SOLICITACAODOCUMENTOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.NUMERO IS NOT NULL AND A.SOLICITACAO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM FT_SOLICITACOES WHERE STATUS = 5 AND FILIAL IN @FILIAIS) AND ((A.VALOR > (SELECT SUM(VALOR) VALOR FROM FT_SOLICITACAODOCUMENTOBAIXAS WHERE SOLICITACAO = A.HANDLE)) OR ((SELECT COUNT(HANDLE) NRECS FROM FT_SOLICITACAODOCUMENTOBAIXAS WHERE SOLICITACAO = A.HANDLE) = 0))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2253_at3732_hsfb8bc04a.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
